oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A FINITE-ELEMENT METHOD FOR A SINGLE-PHASE SEMILINEAR STEFAN PROBLEM IN ONE SPACE DIMENSION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PANI, AK
DAS, PC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: galerkin approximations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Both continuous and discrete - time Galerkin methods are analysed for the numerical approximation of a single phase semilinear Stefan problem with a nonlinear source term. Optimal rates of convergence in L2, H-1 and H-2 - norms are derived for both the cases.
